titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".
Expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

bill.summary:
Supports National Whole Child Month.
Recognizes that ensuring that all children are healthy, safe, engaged, supported, and challenged is a national priority.
Encourages parents, educators, and community members to support and provide a whole child approach to education for each student.
